job_description:
Job DescriptionWe are looking for a great JavaScript developer who is proficient with React.js. Your primary focus will be on developing user interface components and implementing them following well-known React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux). You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product is important.

Responsibilities• Developing new user-facing features using React.js
• Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
• Translating designs and wireframes into high quality code
• Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers
• {{Add other relevant responsibilities here}}

Skills• Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model
• Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles
• Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux)
• Familiarity with newer specifications of EcmaScript
• Experience with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js)
• Knowledge of isomorphic React is a plus
• Familiarity with RESTful APIs
• Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token
• Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools
• Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
• Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
• A knack for benchmarking and optimization

Qualifications: Skills• Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model
Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles
Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux)
Familiarity with newer specifications of EcmaScript
Experience with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js)
Familiarity with RESTful APIs
Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token
Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools
Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc
Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
A knack for benchmarking and optimization
Responsibilities: Your primary focus will be on developing user interface components and implementing them following well-known React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux)
You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain
You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure
Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product is important
Responsibilities• Developing new user-facing features using React.js
Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
Translating designs and wireframes into high quality code
Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers

job_description:
US Citizens and Green Card Holders ONLY**************

Copy of ID/License will be required with submissions************

Contract Length: 6 months+ (could extend based on performance/potential conversion)

Location: REMOTE open to all time zones as long as they are flexible to be on sprints etc.
• This spot will be working on the front-end using React.JS the majority of the time. Front-end 70-80% and Backend 20-30%

Required Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science or a related field.
• 5+ years of React.JS, and JavaScript
• Backend API development - a few years of experience creating APIs using node.js, python (GoLang, rust etc.)
• Some cloud experience – (AWS highly preferred)

Preferred:
• Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
• RDS, S3, IAM, Lambda, API Gateway, Cognito, SQS/SNS, EKS

Full Stack Developer – Platform Engineering

The Full stack developer will help lead the design and development of our platform portal, services, and roadmap. This role will help interface with cross-functional technical and non-technical leadership in evangelizing key technologies we design, build, and offer as services internally and externally for developers and customers.

Qualifications: Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science or a related field
5+ years of React.JS, and JavaScript
Backend API development - a few years of experience creating APIs using node.js, python (GoLang, rust etc.)

job_description:
Our client is seeking a Contract React Developer to join their team! This project is currently in the process of migrating an Angular-based application to React.js with a TypeScript back-end. This role would focus primarily on the Front-end efforts with a focus on leveraging existing patterns and assisting the team in the migration to React. If this aligns well with your background and experience, we would be highly interested in speaking with you!

Required Skills:
• Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model
• Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles
• Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux)
• Knowledge of isomorphic React is a plus
• Familiarity with RESTful APIs
• Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token
• Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools
• Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.

This is a 100% REMOTE contract opportunity

Qualifications: Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model
Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles
Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux)
Familiarity with RESTful APIs
Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token
Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools
Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc
Responsibilities: This project is currently in the process of migrating an Angular-based application to React.js with a TypeScript back-end
This role would focus primarily on the Front-end efforts with a focus on leveraging existing patterns and assisting the team in the migration to React

job_title: Frontend React developer - Contract to Hire
job_description:
We are looking for a skilled Frontend Developer to join our project in creating an admin panel for managing a gym. The ideal candidate will collaborate with our team to develop a user-friendly and efficient admin interface. You will be provided with layouts and wireframes for reference.

Key Responsibilities:

Collaborate with our team to translate UI/UX design wireframes into high-quality code.

Develop a responsive and user-friendly admin panel using React, Node.js, and Typescript.

Implement and maintain effective state management and data visualization.

Ensure the application's reliability and high performance across different browsers and platforms.

Work closely with the backend team to integrate frontend interfaces with the server-side application.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a Frontend Developer or similar role.

Proficiency in React, Node.js, and Typescript.

Experience in developing user interfaces from provided design layouts.

Familiarity with RESTful APIs and their integration into frontend applications.

Ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment.

Qualifications: Proven experience as a Frontend Developer or similar role
Proficiency in React, Node.js, and Typescript
Experience in developing user interfaces from provided design layouts
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and their integration into frontend applications
Ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment
Responsibilities: The ideal candidate will collaborate with our team to develop a user-friendly and efficient admin interface
You will be provided with layouts and wireframes for reference
Collaborate with our team to translate UI/UX design wireframes into high-quality code
Develop a responsive and user-friendly admin panel using React, Node.js, and Typescript
Implement and maintain effective state management and data visualization
Ensure the application's reliability and high performance across different browsers and platforms
Work closely with the backend team to integrate frontend interfaces with the server-side application

job_description:
Location: Dayton/Cincinnati, OH area or remote

As a React Web Developer, you will lead and participate in the design and implementation of React web applications, as well as work with the product team to plan new features, gather requirements, and propose solutions. The key responsibilities of a React Web Developer include:
• Interpret business requirements, create functional specifications, and determine the most efficient/appropriate technologies
• Support the entire application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release, and support)
• Adhere to standards and best practices
• Work to continuously improve software delivery processes and practices
• Design, code, and unit test application code using Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) best practices
• Establish development best practices and growth of web applications standards
• Help foster a culture of innovation and out-of-the-box thinking

Do you have what it takes? Are you driven to implement creative solutions that unravel complex and ever-changing challenges? We value passion, curiosity, and perseverance with an ability to communicate ideas and results to diverse audiences. We look for people who thrive in collaborative and independent assignments, have the aptitude to learn new data quickly, and who are willing to mentor junior team members. Key skills we look for include:
• 2+ years of React development experience
• 5+ years of Web development experience
• Prior React Lead experience is desired
• Prior experience with large scale websites or highly complex projects
• A solid understanding of React concepts, components, and workflows
• A solid understanding of web development concepts such as REST APIs, responsive design, and security
• Ability to interact well in a team environment
• Strong organizational skills to manage multiple timelines and complete tasks quickly within the constraints of timelines and budgets
• Ability to work with new technologies while demonstrating drive, adaptability, and creative thinking

A little more about us. At Illumination Works, we know data, and we should, we’ve been doing it since we started in 2006! We specialize in everything data from big data to data science, software engineering, data management, AR/IoT, and cloud development. Illumination Works is a trusted technology partner in user-centered digital transformation—delivering impactful business results to clients. We partner with customers to solve their unique technology and data challenges, and stay on top of modern technologies and advancements leveraging our Innovation Lab.

Why choose us? We invest in our employees in all aspects of their life and we value family. We offer market competitive salary, a generous PTO package, and comprehensive medical, dental, vision and life insurance plans. We also offer 401K, short/long-term disability insurance, a fun and engaging culture, and training opportunities to keep you up to speed on the latest technologies.

Illumination Works is committed to hiring and retaining a diverse workforce. We are an Equal Opportunity Employer, making decisions without regard to race, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or national origin, age, veteran status, disability, or any other protected class. Acceptable candidates must successfully pass a drug test and background screen.

Qualifications: We value passion, curiosity, and perseverance with an ability to communicate ideas and results to diverse audiences
We look for people who thrive in collaborative and independent assignments, have the aptitude to learn new data quickly, and who are willing to mentor junior team members
2+ years of React development experience
5+ years of Web development experience
Prior experience with large scale websites or highly complex projects
A solid understanding of React concepts, components, and workflows
A solid understanding of web development concepts such as REST APIs, responsive design, and security
Ability to interact well in a team environment
Strong organizational skills to manage multiple timelines and complete tasks quickly within the constraints of timelines and budgets
Ability to work with new technologies while demonstrating drive, adaptability, and creative thinking
Acceptable candidates must successfully pass a drug test and background screen
Responsibilities: As a React Web Developer, you will lead and participate in the design and implementation of React web applications, as well as work with the product team to plan new features, gather requirements, and propose solutions
Interpret business requirements, create functional specifications, and determine the most efficient/appropriate technologies
Support the entire application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release, and support)
Adhere to standards and best practices
Work to continuously improve software delivery processes and practices
Design, code, and unit test application code using Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) best practices
Establish development best practices and growth of web applications standards
Help foster a culture of innovation and out-of-the-box thinking
Benefits: We offer market competitive salary, a generous PTO package, and comprehensive medical, dental, vision and life insurance plans
We also offer 401K, short/long-term disability insurance, a fun and engaging culture, and training opportunities to keep you up to speed on the latest technologies

job_description:
Job Title: Sr. React/Node.JS Developer

Client Location: Jacksonville, FL (Remote Only)

Duration: Long Term

U.S. Citizens, Green Card Holders W2 consultants please

Job Description

React Developers are responsible for the development, programming, and coding of Information Technology solutions using ReactJS, Redux, D3 and NodeJS to enable Client Customer Experience applications. They will engage in all phases of the software development lifecycle which include: gathering and analyzing user/business system requirements, responding to outages and creating application system models. Developers are responsible for documenting detailed system specifications and will participate in evaluating, conducting performance testing, and all planned and unplanned maintenance for both internally developed applications and purchased products. They will participate in design meetings and consult with clients to refine, test and debug programs to meet business needs and interact and sometimes direct third party partners in the achievement of business and technology initiatives. Developers are responsible for including IT Controls to protect the confidentiality, integrity, as well as availability of the application and data processed or output by the application.

GENERAL REQUIREMENTS:

Experience with unit testing, release procedures, coding design and documentation protocol as well as change management procedures

Demonstrated organizational, analytical and interpersonal skills

Flexible team player

Ability to manage tasks independently and take ownership of responsibilities

Ability to learn from mistakes and apply constructive feedback to improve performance

Must demonstrate initiative and effective independent decision-making skills

Ability to communicate technical information clearly and articulately

Ability to adapt to a rapidly changing environment

In-depth understanding of the systems development life cycle

Proficiency programming in more than one object-oriented programming language; React.Js, Node.JS, JavaScript, and HTML

o Proficiency with HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript/jQuery, local storage, and cross-browser compatibility are required

o May include database knowledge in TSQL and MongoBD

Experience with modern web/UI development tools and techniques: Node, Webpack, Grunt/Gulp, GIT, Axios, Jest

Proficiency using standard desktop applications such as MS Suite and flowcharting tools such as Visio

Proficiency using debugging tools such as; Advanced Debugger, Allinea DDT, AQtime, ARM, CA/EZTEST, etc

Solid knowledge of DOM manipulation and client-side validation

Solid knowledge with jQuery and other JavaScript libraries

High critical thinking skills to evaluate alternatives and present solutions that are consistent with business objectives and strategy

Experience with responsive grid systems

Solid knowledge of React and Redux principals and build out

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:

The preferred qualifications listed below reflect desired knowledge, skill, and/or experience.

Additional Preferred Qualifications:

Experience using Agile, Waterfall, and hybrid methodology

Python

SQL

Required Work Experience:

3+ years related work experience, Professional experience with technical design and coding in the IT industry

Looking for solid React and Node (Full-stack) developer to include:
• Python
• SQL

Required Education:

HS Diploma or GED

Demonstrated organizational, analytical and interpersonal skills
Flexible team player
Ability to manage tasks independently and take ownership of responsibilities

job_description:
We are looking for a developer with experience in HTML, CSS, and React to work on a simple project that has the potential to become a long-term engagement. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of front-end development and be able to implement designs using HTML and CSS, as well as build interactive components using React. This project will involve creating a user-friendly interface and ensuring a smooth user experience. Attention to detail and the ability to work independently are key qualities we are seeking. The successful candidate will have the opportunity to contribute to the ongoing development and growth of our application.

[Please note that this position is open to candidates who are based in the United States.]

Qualifications: We are looking for a developer with experience in HTML, CSS, and React to work on a simple project that has the potential to become a long-term engagement

job_description:
Additional Information:

What is the project this person will be working on?: EBS Reach Platform
How will they contribute to the project?: Software functional development

What is the makeup of the team? A small group of six to ten engineers

Does the candidate need to be in a certain Client location/hub or remote?: Bentonville
Will a Client badge be needed at onset or in the future?: Y
If hybrid or in office role, how many days a week will the candidate need to come into the office?: In office Monday and Wednesday 8:30AM-5:00PM CST
Please note that candidates who will be working in Bentonville, AR, Reston, VA or some Texas locations must have a VendorSAFE background check completed.

Does this contract have the opportunity to extend or convert to an FTE?: Yes, this is a contract-to-hire position

Have you previously hired for this role?: Y
If so, where have candidates historically fallen short?: Difficulty adapting to multiple different technologies

Description:

We are seeking a Software Engineer 3 Nodejs/Java/React developer for a key position within our team.

What are the top 3 skills needed/required?
• 4+ years of working experience in Nodejs/Java (any kind of Java)
• Knowledge of Kafka or other high volume-low latency messaging infrastructure.
• Experience of Micro service REST architecture principles and patterns
• What skills and/or experience would separate the top candidate?

What makes a candidate profile stand out to you?
• GraphQL and React
• Working experience in RDBMS (Azure SQL, SQL Server , PostgreSQL ) and NoSQL DB
• Have designed, build, and maintain APIs, services, and systems on cloud at large scale.
• Have experience with Azure Cloud Stack or any other cloud stacks.
• Working experience with CI/CD and unit testing
• Nice to have knowledge of Kubernetes and other CNCF tools.
• Are curious and have the desire to learn.
• Previous Client experience is a plus

What will this person's day-to-day responsibilities be?:
• Work on assigned Engineering projects by providing pertinent documents, direction, and examples; identifying short and long term solutions and timeline; reviewing and approving proposed solutions, implementing new architectural patterns; and performing design and code reviews of changes.
• Leads the discovery phase of medium to large projects to come up with high level design by partnering with the product management, business partners, project management, business and user experience teams; obtaining cross-function approvals; driving proof-of-concept; and implementing prototypes to validate ideas.
• Leads and participates in medium to large-scale, complex, cross-functional projects by reviewing project requirements; translating requirements into technical solutions; gathering requested information (for example, design documents, product requirements, wire frames); writing and developing code; conducting unit testing; communicating status and issues to team members and stakeholders; collaborating with project team and cross functional teams; troubleshooting open issues and bug-fixes; enhancing design to prevent re-occurrences of defects; ensuring on-time delivery and hand-offs; interacting with project manager to provide input on project plan; and providing leadership to the project team.
• Supports business objectives by collaborating with business partners to identify opportunities; addressing high-priority initiatives (for example, business strategy, technical feasibility, implementation alternatives); identifying short and long-term solutions; and leading cross-functional partnership.
• Troubleshoots business and production issues by reviewing and analyzing information (for example, issue, impact, criticality, possible root cause); engaging support teams to assist in the resolution of issues; formulating an action plan; directing actions as designated in the plan; interpreting the results to determine further action; performs root cause analysis to prevent future occurrence of issues; and completing online documentation.

Required Skills : React,nodeJS,Java
Additional Skills : Software Developer

Qualifications: Does the candidate need to be in a certain Client location/hub or remote?: Bentonville
We are seeking a Software Engineer 3 Nodejs/Java/React developer for a key position within our team
4+ years of working experience in Nodejs/Java (any kind of Java)
Knowledge of Kafka or other high volume-low latency messaging infrastructure
Experience of Micro service REST architecture principles and patterns
GraphQL and React
Working experience in RDBMS (Azure SQL, SQL Server , PostgreSQL ) and NoSQL DB
Have designed, build, and maintain APIs, services, and systems on cloud at large scale
Have experience with Azure Cloud Stack or any other cloud stacks
Working experience with CI/CD and unit testing
